Reset Cache and Update all Local Data

reset_cache.Rd

Reset Cache and Update all Local Data

reset_cache(refresh_data = FALSE)

Arguments

refresh_data

Logical defaults to FALSE. Should all data sources be refreshed once the cache has been removed.

Value

Null

Examples


## Code
reset_cache
#> function (refresh_data = FALSE) 
#> {
#>     unlink("cache", recursive = TRUE)
#>     cache <- memoise::cache_filesystem(".cache")
#>     if (refresh_data) {
#>         tmp <- NCoVUtils::get_international_linelist()
#>         tmp <- NCoVUtils::get_who_cases()
#>         tmp < -NCoVUtils::get_italy_regional_cases()
#>     }
#>     return(invisible(NULL))
#> }
#> <bytecode: 0x562b958e00b0>
#> <environment: namespace:NCoVUtils>
